example: जनाः मां पश्यन्ति, सर्वतः च धावन्ति।
iso_transliteration: janāḥ māṁ paśyanti, sarvataḥ ca dhāvanti.
english_translation: People see me, and run here and there.

example: मेहता साहब कल आएंगे और मैं उन्हें देखूंगा।
iso_transliteration: mēhatā sāhaba kala āēṁgē aura maiṁ unhēṁ dēkhūṁgā.
english_translation: Mr. Mehta will come tomorrow and I will see him.

example:
भिक्षाम् अट गां च आनय।
Here, अट् - is a मुख्य क्रियापद and गां च आनय। is its अन्वाचय।
पश्य,  मृगो धावति।
iso_transliteration:
bhikṣām aṭa gāṁ ca ānaya.
---
paśya, mr̥gō dhāvati.

example: जब मैं कल मेहता साहब से मिलूंगा, तो मैं उन्हें अपनी नई कार दिखाऊंगा।
iso_transliteration: jaba maiṁ kala mēhatā sāhaba sē milūṁgā, tō maiṁ unhēṁ apanī naī kāra dikhāūṁgā.
english_translation: When I meet Mr. Mehta tomorrow, I will show him my new car.
